review_text: I bought as an early birthday gift for my Mum as she was struggling to see things on her old Samsung. Having the same layout of keys but larger has meant an easy transition from one to the other and she is now thrilled to be back in easy communication again - essential (particularly in the last 14 months or so) as we live at opposite ends of the country! Simple to use , she loves the docking style charging base and hasn't had anything negative to say about it at all.
Garbage failed to charge . when it did charge the connections were v. poor and loose
Easy phone to use, I bought for my 90 yr old uncle

Bought for a 95yr old care home resident.  Not able to go in and explain how to use due to current pandemic.  Depended on staff.  She had no problem adjusting to this phone.  Raised digits easy to see.  Press bright green button to answer and red button to end call.
This phone is ideal for my mom who is 82 this month. Ease of use for her is what she needed.

It's a big button phone for people who struggle with technology.
The person I got it for still needed help to set it up.
I'm amazed they manage to make toast without burning down the house.

Not for my personal use i bought it for my nana
It is simple to use 
great phone for elderly 
Big buttons
Not the loudest but acceptable
The phone arrived on time. It charged up well and receives calls and texts. It also has an FM radio and torch. Worth every penny!
A simple straightforward phone, easy to use.perfect for an elderly person to use.

Bought this for my elderly Mother who was afraid to use a Mobile. So easy to use and love the SOS button that we have programmed our phone numbers into so she only has to press this in an emergency. Would highly recommend especially for the price.

I bought this phone for my mum who was in hospital and struggling with the mobile she had. After spending 6 hours wondering why i couldn't get this phone to work, i found out it is commonly used in india and southern america because it uses 2g!!! Why are argos selling phones that are 2g? Beggars belief.....
Bought this for my mum in her 80's and struggles with new phones. This phone is simple to use has a large screen and big buttons.....perfect for older people...would highly recommend this phone.

Took less than 15 mins to setup. There is no easy way to import a contact list, so took about an hour to multitap input all her contacts. (Keeping contacts on the SIM would have solved this, but her old phone was busted so couldn't transfer to SIM) Phone is easy to use with clear easy to read screen. . Reading text is straight forward, but she will probably never use it to send text messages. (multitap is too complicated but hey she never send a text before anyway).

This us just what my husband needed.
Easy to use and set up.

I bought this phone for my Dad who is in his eighties. It's a great little phone that does everything he needs at a very competitive price. Perfect.

The click and collect service from Argos worked a treat.

Good brand.
worth buying it.
Excellent service,and product satisfaction,can't fault in any way
NOT BAD FOR THE PRICE ONLY NOT THE LOUDSPEAKER IS NOT VERY LOUD FOR THOSE WITH HEARING DIFFICULTY.

Just needed a simple mobile phone for my mum who's now struggling with things. Easy to set up and should be easy for mum to use, when I can get her to try it. The buttons are big and nothing looks complicated so hopefully it'll be perfect for her.
Good value for money, easy to use , good screen sizeDD

Bought phone for elderly parent who isnt tech savvy but got the hang of this phone very easily.
Easy to set up and with the big buttons makes a big difference to make the phone easier to use
Very quick and easy pick up and all covid procedures made the purchase very easy
Easy to use .. clear sound and good size buttons . Ideal for the elderly or partially sighted
I am very pleased with this phone as I only need something to receive texts and make the odd call.  The large buttons are an added bonus
It is great for my mum as her eyesight is not good

Bought this for my disabled dad - my dad is on 02 but it wouldn’t accept his sim - I took back to the shop as would have been perfect for him asked them to try but no luck - ended up having to swap for a different phone! Very disappointed as he has had a stroke and struggles with other phones this one would have been perfect! It doesn’t say that it wouldn’t accept 02
Does what it says on the tin. Easy to use and navigate. Got it for my elderly father to use and he found it ok.
This big buttoned mobile phone is great, got it for my elderly mother, it surprised me by having a camera, music player, radio and games. It's designed well and easy to use.
Larger keys and numbers gave ease of use to mum who wanted an upgrade for phone but not 'swipe type' using it regularly no complaints.
This was purchased for an elderly relative who understands very little about technology.  She needed an easy, no frills phone with large buttons and this fit the purpose perfectly.

Bought phone for my 85 year old mother. She h as poor eyesight and has not used a mobile phone before. She has found it easy to use and has my number programmed into sos function so can call with push of one button.
Answering phone is easy as it can be programmed so any button can be pressed to receive call.

This was bought for my 88 year old Auntie. She’s struggling a bit with it but that would be the case whichever phone she had. I personally think it’s simple and the closest mobile to a house phone. Great for the elderly.

It wass just what was needed for my elderly mother. She found it easy to use.The size was wide enough so she could hold it comfortably. The sos button is a great idea and means mam can contact me in an emergency. Would definitely recommend this phone.

The definition and volume very much improved on the last mobile i had.I have ordered another one.
Ordering and delivery  very good and importantly for me, time saving;Thankyou

I wanted a cheap 2nd phone for work, this is fine for just calls and texts. But i need my whatsapp and emails.
I it hard getting the sim in the correct slot as has 2 so you can use 2 different sims.
This phone just not for me.
Large buttons easy to use perfect for the elderly
A simple to use, big button phone for my mum. Arrived quickly and was easy to collect. Thank you.
Great purchase and the service was amazing. Thank you.
Bought it for my 80 year old mother in hospital with no visitors. She can use it, I preloaded our contacts and now she can chat with the family.
I bought this for my 83 year old mum and it suits her down to the ground. Easy to see with larger buttons and easy to learn the features. She is really happy with it.
Big buttons , easy to use , clear screen, value for money

Whilst this phone is basic by modern standards it is a exactly what we wanted for an 80 year old who was over the moon with their new phone The emergency call button is a great feature , it comes with a nice and neat charging station and the battery life is great.
Bought for my dad as he needed a simple and easy phone. Just the job
My only issue is that as a senior I had some problems inserting a SIM card as instructions were not accurate. I had help from a Sainsbury’s person.
Easy to use phone for older generation, he’s very pleased with it

We wanted an easy to use unlocked mobile to use as a house phone as the current land line provider is giving a great broadband deal but is frightening on calls. So 1 unlimited call cheap sim deal later we needed a phone the wife could use. She has arthritis and just cannot use smart phones . This is easy to use holds it's charge for a long time . If you want a phone for people who have difficulty with modern phones this is ideal. Even has an SOS feature.

Bought for my grandparents to keep in touch. Aside from the obvious big buttons, it has some really well thought out features, such as:
- SOS button on back of phone
- Speed dial
- Long battery life
- Loud speakers
- Charges in a stand/mount (like a landline)

Would totally recommend!
Very bad all around. Setting up is difficult. Manual is unreadable, texting is impossible. Menu is ludicrous. Who would want a double SIM card in that thing is beyond me.

Phone perfect for any one who is a little slow with phones
My husband has a small mental problem so very good for him
Good little phone, it’s on a 2g network but still works fine.
Great phone easy to use for any age charging base like land line so easy for placing on rather than fiddling with lead great product not too expensive
Great basic phone suitable for elderly persons who just need to call and text people
Unfortunately the phone was bought for my husband. Could not send messages to or from so returned.
Bought as a gift easy to use if you just want a basic phone

Got this phone for my dad who's 76 and can not work phones , its great his in hospital with covid and if he can't use it he presses the emergency button we get a text saying ring dad emergency so we do and get to speak to him so its a great phone and cheap to

The mobile is simple and easy to use for someone who is unable to use a touch screen, especially if they have fat fingers, the big buttons is helpful in that way.
The screen is a bit small but it is bigger than the old Nokia 3310.
Find the large button Phone easy to use, with good features included, will enjoy further  features as I get used to using it. A good value for money

Purchased this phone for an elderly relative and it has proved to be an excellent choice. It is easy to set up and easy for the non-techy minded to use. The red emergency button is great as our relative just presses it and is connected. Not seen anything else like this on the market.
Great phone for the elderly or short sighted , brought for nan , she can use it fine no problems , easy to use

I bought this for my mam who is 76 years old. Big button which does help. We had a problem with SIM card as some of them didn’t fit so phone wouldn’t work. My mam has hearing aids but finds it difficult when mobile rings even on high volume setting.

Bought for my dad as has big button's.  Recieved calls and would let him text, but wouldn't let him make calls. On getting in touch argos blamed o2 and o2 blamed argos, so sent phone back and bought elsewhere

I bought this for my gran as she lost her other one. For the price this phone is excellent for her. The big buttons make it easy to see and use and it is simple to set up. This phone also comes with an SOS button meaning that if she is in trouble all she has to do is press the button and it will alert us that she needs help. Overall a great phone especially for older people.
Bought to replace a touch screen phone that my dad kept missing calls on.Does what it was bought for with the touch of a button.
Great little phone ,withl large buttons ,easy to use for my elderly parent .

I saw a phone in the Daily Mail which was £70 plus, but my daughter persuaded me too buy this one for my husband who is hard of hearing and who knows nothing about technology. It was very difficult to get the Sim in, but after doing so, it isn't loud enough for my husband to hear even with hearing aids in. It just doesn't have the facilities that the 70 pound one did. Looks like I will have to buy !!!
We had to return this mobile phone as it would not accept his old sim card even after we bought a sim card adapter.
Absolutely waste of money the battery gets red hot on charging it can not use it
Brought this as a present, on opening the package no battery. Can not take it back as store closed due to covid.
Simple not perfect but does the job
Bought for elderly father in law abs perfect fur him. He got the hang of it quickly and buttons are nice and big

A nice looking phone with a large screen and large clear buttons, but utterly dreadful to use, it's not user friendly or intuitive, there's very little choice of ring tones or message tones, picture quality is poor, the instruction booklet is confusing with very small print, definitely a phone to avoid
I bought this phone for my mum because of the bigger buttons as it was ideal for her  took it out the box on Christmas day and the battery won't even charge will be returning it once lockdown is over

Great phone for someone who just wants an easy to see and use mobile  for calls and texts ..perfect for our elderly mom ..its had so much use already , she's loving it and is on it constantly   lol ...handy emergency call button on back too ..was simple to swop in sim and set up ..the docking charging unit that came with it is super handy to just drop phone into instead of messing with a fiddly lead ..long battery life  ... And call quality is clear ..great price too ...
My father inlaw loves this phone its easy to use and has large buttons.

Bought this for my 82yr old mother in law so we could keep in touch with her in her care home during lockdown. She's not technically minded but this is just perfect for her, big buttons and simple to use. The entire family can now keep in touch and it's been a lifeline for her.
Wouldn't recommend this product very basic

Simple to use. Great for the elderly.
Happy to reccomend.

My grandmother was in need of a new phone. This was perfect as it has big buttons and a decent size screen.
It also comes with a touch that is helpful for her and incase for an emergency a SOS button on the back.
She was pleased to find out she could take photos with it also

You don’t have to be IT savvy to set this phone up. Quite simple really. The phone takes a standard SIM card so if you are going to use an existing SIM card from a previous phone which is a nano or micro sim, all you need to do is buy a SIM card adapter kit. They are only a couple of quid. 
This phone is a great size. Clear screen and large buttons. 
It also  comes with its own docking system for charging.

Bought it because I wanted large buttons to make texting easier. took a while to understand where SIM went but got there in the end. It's a great phone for those who want a basic job like me. Easy to operate.

This Alba phone has a screen large enough to see who I dial or what I text, The big buttons and big numbers are easy to see and ideal for someone with thick fingers, The width of the phone makes it easy for me to grip, And the simplicity of its operation is ideal for some one of advanced years like myself.
Third of this model, a good phone. However had to replace twice in two years as the phone will no longer charge.

I bought this for my Mum who spent some time in hospital. She can't work out how to make calls but can answer - so that is a great bonus. Some of the instructions take time to work out but it didn't take time to set it up. The big buttons are great for her arthritic fingers.
Low cost basic big button phone with easy to use charging dock - Ideal for poor eyes, clumsy or less nimble fingers or one armed use. Allows the less able to easily keep in touch.
Great little phone, bought 2 for the mother and father in law. They wanted keypads and screens which were easy to use, this phone ticks all the boxes, nothing complicated, they can dial and talk.

Bought this as a replacement phone for my father who is in his 80's and completely baffled by technology. Just popped his original full sized sim card in and he was good to go!
Easy to set up and even easier for my father to use once I had set up the speed dials.
The SOS button on the back is a great feature but thankfully has only been tested and not used for real!
the phone was good value for the price
fantastic little phone but getting the sim in was very fiddly and not easy for elderly fingers !

I thought i wouldnt lone with big buttons,... but im really over the moon with this fone,... ike this fone as i need a fone with big button because my eye sight is poor,.. i have already recommened this fone to my 6 frinds,... Aldo ,... Dennistoun ,.. Glasgow....

Lovely little phone which fits perfectly into my pocket, very easy to set up and nice and simple to use. Delivered to me very rapid with no hassle at all, Argos delivery driver rang me shortly before arriving to confirm everything. Perfection all round. Very happy.

The bigger buttons are great, the SOS button can to easily be operated by accident.  The display is good, it would be better if the ring could be louder for those with poor hearing.   The instructions that come with it are to a very poor standard and setting up is awkward and time consuming. A cheap device purchased as a lifeline type device.   If purchasing for someone elderly I suggest you set it up for them first. With some thought and design revisit this could be so much better.
Great phone for anyone who's visually impaired and simple to use.
The price good costumer service helpful

Bought for my 84 year old grandmother, who needed some peace of mind with a phone she could use in emergencies.
Torch is a nice added extra and the use and ease of the phone is great.

Got a refund from Argos!, this phone never worked, the kind salesman in Argos tried to get the sim to work, no good so he tried a new sim and the phone still didn’t work. Total waste of time! Got it for my father in law who has poor eyesight originally.
very simple design with emergency call button on back --seems to do all that would be required for elderly relative --big buttons/number storage/emergency button/volume control etcetc.
Nice and easy to use and good volume for the person it was intended for...

A nice phone with large keyboard suitable for my 87 year old mother 
Only problem was inserting the sim this was not very easy and needs clearer instructions 
But my mother is getting on fine now with it
Bought for my 92 year old mother.  She found it relatively easy to use and the big buttons help.
Great to use my mum loves it...simple
easy to use and ideal for an older person
The phone was perfect for the purpose it was bought solved a big problem

Perfect for my requirements, simple phone, call and text that's all I want. Unfortunately no calculator which might have been handy and SMS 'write options' always seems to reset back to simple abc (rather than predict, which I select) after each sent message. No major problems, SIM hard to insert - worried I'd break it! For those like me who hate touchscreens this is great! Overall I'd still give 5 stars.
Cheap phone very basic ideal for a spare phone and worth the money delivery service was great and fast

only downfall is the battery life 
could be longer. but it is easy touse
Nice phone for a person who need a mobile phone for just text messages and calles like the torch feature too
Great design and easy for my dad to use.

Purchased this large button sim free mobile phone for my technophobe 74yr old dad.  Birthday is next week.

He loves it!!!   He took it to Vodafone and all his info was transferred over.  It's quick and easy to charge, and he found a leather pouch to keep it safe in.
Ideal phone for my 91 year old Dad, simple to use, buttons easy for him to press, he can even take photos.
Good phone for those who need big buttons. SIM card can be a bit tricky to get working, but keep trying - for a great uncle which is good and sound is loud enough
Good mobile however only 2 ringtone choices and Bluetooth connection to car needs to manually connect each time.

If you want a phone that is easy to text and call from then this is good. 

It takes the older SIM cards, which is important if you want to keep your number and not have to have a sim swap.

You need more memory for photos which can be added.

Useful emergency call button on back.
Marvellous just what the doctor ordered
The phone is good. Easy to use for my elderly father in law. Only thing is that it just isn't loud enough to hear over an engine!
Good price. Good size keys, easy to use. Handy item. Staff very helpful.
Bought it for elderly family member no complaints

I bought it for someone with poor eyesight and she seems to be able to make calls on it most of the time. The main fault I found with it is this: You're supposed to be able to program it so that it doesn't start in LOCKED mode. That didn't work for me, so unlocking it each time added an unnecessary complication to making a call.

Bought for an elderly relative. I can't accurately review this product because the first one we had didn't even turn on despite being charged using the charger that came with it. The replacement turned on and charged OK but the battery only lasted 30 minutes before turning off. Also the charger was so fierce that the phone got so hot that it melted the Sim card. Load of rubbish. Asking for a refund.
This phone was for my mum , she found it was a good size screen . Does all she needs it for
Great little phone if you just want calls and text but has no internet access so cant make voip calls such as whatsapp.
I brought this phone for my grandad when he out running his errands in case of emergency. He loves it would recommend and its easy to use.

Perfect size and sturdy phone , my dad who’s in his 80’s can use it yes problem . The charging cradle is a great idea as he was always loosing the charger to his previous phone . My only slight criticism is the instructions and the sim holder are not very clear

For the person  who wants a phone mainly to make and receive calls  This phone is very easy to use      sits snuggle into the hand   the bigger  keypad buttons  reduce the risk of mis dialing      a built in touch  makes this a great  little phone  Allan
I bought this mobile for my uncle who is elderly.This is a basic no frills mobile phone that allows you to make and receive calls, without complicated menus.

Got this for my elderly parents,to replace old phone that gave up.
Easy to set up and use they love it.They are even ringing me now from it,thats a first.
Fantastic phone very nice and small enough
I bought for my dad has he needed a replacement mobile, the numbers are big and easy to see. A good buy
Very happy and easy to use

Purchased for elderly relative. Unable to swap SIM cards, slots too big for card! staff at local store also tried and failed.
Also Big orange sos button on rear which sticks out has potential to go off in error in pocket or handbag. 
Shame as buttons good size and looked easy and straightforward to use.
The phone is simple to use. The big buttons are great.ideal for the older person who doesn't want a smart phone.
Terrific little phone, only scored it down for not having loudspeak feature.
The phone is easy to use and looks well made and like it will last well. It was exactly what my Grandma wanted as it has a simple menu to follow. Exactly as described!

I bought this product for a relative in hospital. I liked that I can buy from Argos at a local grocery shop like Sainsburys. They were also open late. The service was good because I could walk in a quickly buy the product I needed.

The phone is great as it has big buttons which are useful for the elderly. The large green and red button also makes it clear those are to call or cancel calls. It was great it came with a charging dock.
Good good well worth the money
Easy to use for my mother in law, very happy.
very pleased with the phone, features very clear would recommend for the older user
Phone is very light, has large easy to read buttons & is excellent value

Was looking for a sim free big button mobile phone for my mum. Mainly, she wanted a good, standard mobile phone, that she could see and use frequently, without any difficulty. I found the Alba big button mobile phone, ticked all the boxes. Mum thinks its a fabulous item. She is very pleased and satisfied with the design. Not only can Mum keep in touch the family by phone, she is now able to send text messages to her grandchildren with ease.
This mobile phone is reliable, easy and quick to use.

I am severely sigh impaired and my old phone the button were too small. Decided to try this and its brilliant. Easy to se and the buttons are much better. The screen is nice and bright too and easy enough to read with my special glasses. Easy to set up too. Delighted with this phone and recommended it to some of my friends.
iThe phone was for the mother in law she loves it

Bought for my Mum as she was struggling with her tiny phone. 
The charging cradle is a really nice touch for someone with poor mobility.
Considering it's plainly marketed at the senior market, this doesn't quite cut it in the accessibility stakes. Nice big screen but the background image is useless for someone with poor eyesight. No easy way to switch it to plain background without putting in a memory card, or just make the screen black and white.
Bought for my father who just wants a simple phone to use for calls and occasional txt. Just what he needed and took his old style sim card

With the larger numbers and letters, I can use without the aid of my glasses. Have always had an excellent connection when using, never had no problems with the phone, just the ease of using impressed me.

I purchased this for my elderly mother who was struggling with her "easy to use" smart phone. The big, coloured buttons and quick access to "Contacts" make it easy to use. It is light and simple to setup. I had to use a SIM adaptor to convert the previous smart phone nano SIM to a standard SIM but this connected without any problems.
Great phone for my mum, larger buttons for easy view. Loud ring tone too.
Good basic big button mobile bought for elderly parent. No Internet connectivity or apps but just what she wanted/needed. Dual sim is a handy feature.
Bought this phone for my nanna and she much prefers it to her previous Nokia model. Set up is so simple and easy to use. Buttons are easy to read and use. Great purchase !!
My 90 year old grandad finds it very easy to use
i bought for my grandma and she loves it

Bought for an elderly relative. It is a great little phone that is very reasonably priced. Easy to use with the big buttons and he managed to use independently with no issues. An excellent gift for an elderly person or young first time user.

Bland generic phone with abysmal menu/texting system. Gave up after a couple of months and replaced it with the Doro 1370 - which looks similar but is leaps and bounds ahead when it comes to usability.

what a delighful uncluttered and well thought out budget phone. A lovely simple layout which feels great in the hands with easy read numbers. Ideal for the senior citizen or for someone who just wants a simple back up phone with no bloatware, bells and whistles

This big button phone works well. I can see the buttons 
Delivered on time and in good order thanks
Excellent phone. Easy to use with large buttons. Purchased for an elderly relative and they are very happy with it
Bought for my Elderly mother. She is finding it really good to use.
standard but ok for elderly
I bought this for my elderly Mother who has never had a mobile phone. It’s easy to use and the big buttons really help.

I got this phone as i only need it for phone calls and texting this phone is ideal for this also like the big buttons easy yo use the radio has great sound also all in all im glad i chose this phone its a great wee phone and ideal for anyone who is just looking for a phone for calls and texts only
